Article.ArticleTitle: Visceral leishmaniasis in an adult case in Northeast of Iran: A case report and literature review.

AbstractText: Leishmaniasis is a rare complication in adult cases even in endemic areas. Here, the first report of visceral leishmaniasis in a young woman in northeast of Iran has been described.
